mapper.select: SELECT A.NUM, B.ZZJC AS FZJG FROM ( SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT(RWBH)) AS NUM, FZJG FROM T_GZRW_JBXX WHERE BJQK = '0' GROUP BY FZJG ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ZZBH, ZZJC FROM U_WRYDTGL_XC.T_ADMIN_RMS_ZZJG ) B ON A.FZJG = B.ZZBH

SELECT A.NUM, B.ZZQC AS FZJG FROM ( SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT(RWBH)) AS NUM, FZJG FROM T_GZRW_JBXX GROUP BY FZJG ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ZZBH, ZZQC FROM T_ADMIN_RMS_ZZJG ) B ON A.FZJG = B.ZZBH ORDER BY NUM DESC

SELECT A.NUM, B.ZZJC AS FZJG FROM( SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT(RWBH)) AS NUM,FZJG FROM T_GZRW_JBXX WHERE YQBJSJ <= SYSDATE AND BJQK = '0'
AND TO_CHAR(CJSJ,'YYYY-MM')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM')
AND TRUNC(CJSJ) = TRUNC(SYSDATE,'YYYY')
AND CJSJ >= TRUNC(NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE-8,1)+1) AND CJSJ < TRUNC(NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE-8,1)+7)+1
GROUP BY FZJG ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ZZBH, ZZJC FROM U_WRYDTGL_XC.T_ADMIN_RMS_ZZJG ) B ON A.FZJG = B.ZZBH
SELECT B.ZZJC AS FZJG FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT FZJG FROM T_GZRW_JBXX WHERE SYSDATE > YQBJSJ AND BJQK = '0') A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ZZBH, ZZJC FROM U_WRYDTGL_XC.T_ADMIN_RMS_ZZJG ) B ON A.FZJG = B.ZZBH

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(RWBH)) AS NUM FROM T_GZRW_JBXX WHERE 1=1
AND TO_CHAR(CJSJ,'YYYY-MM')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM')
AND TO_CHAR(CJSJ,'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')
AND CJSJ >= TRUNC(NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE-8,1)+1) AND CJSJ < TRUNC(NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE-8,1)+7)+1

SELECT NUM, DMJMC FROM( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(RWBH)) AS NUM,YWLX FROM T_GZRW_JBXX WHERE 1=1
AND TO_CHAR(CJSJ,'YYYY-MM')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM')
AND TO_CHAR(CJSJ,'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')
AND CJSJ >= TRUNC(NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE-8,1)+1) AND CJSJ < TRUNC(NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE-8,1)+7)+1
GROUP BY YWLX ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM T_PLATFORM_GGDMJ ) B ON A .YWLX = B.DMJBH

SELECT G.FZJG,G.NUM,G.BJ FROM ( SELECT T.*, ROWNUM R FROM ( SELECT * FROM( SELECT Y.ZZJC AS FZJG, X.NUM, X.BJ FROM( SELECT A.FZJG, A.NUM, B.NUM AS BJ FROM (SELECT FZJG,COUNT(DISTINCT(RWBH)) AS NUM FROM T_GZRW_JBXX WHERE 1=1
AND TO_CHAR(CJSJ,'YYYY-MM')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM')
AND TO_CHAR(CJSJ,'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')
AND CJSJ >= TRUNC(NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE-8,1)+1) AND CJSJ < TRUNC(NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE-8,1)+7)+1
GROUP BY FZJG) A LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(RWBH)) AS NUM,FZJG FROM T_GZRW_JBXX WHERE
BJQK = '1'
AND TO_CHAR(CJSJ,'YYYY-MM')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM')
AND TO_CHAR(CJSJ,'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')
AND CJSJ >= TRUNC(NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE-8,1)+1) AND CJSJ < TRUNC(NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE-8,1)+7)+1
GROUP BY FZJG) B ON A.FZJG = B.FZJG ) X LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ZZBH, ZZJC FROM U_WRYDTGL_XC.T_ADMIN_RMS_ZZJG ) Y ON X.FZJG = Y.ZZBH ) ORDER BY NUM DESC ) T WHERE ROWNUM <=5 ) G WHERE R > 0

SELECT Y.zzjc AS FZJG, B.NUM, B.MARKTYPE FROM ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(RWBH)) AS NUM, FZJG, MARKTYPE FROM T_GZRW_JBXX WHERE BJQK = '1'
AND TO_CHAR(CJSJ,'YYYY-MM')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM')
AND TO_CHAR(CJSJ,'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')
AND CJSJ >= TRUNC(NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE-8,1)+1) AND CJSJ < TRUNC(NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE-8,1)+7)+1
GROUP BY FZJG, MARKTYPE) B LEFT JOIN( SELECT ZZBH, ZZJC FROM U_WRYDTGL_XC.T_ADMIN_RMS_ZZJG ) Y ON B.FZJG = Y.ZZBH

SELECT A.NUM AS TOTAL, A.CJSJ AS CJSJ, B.NUM AS BJ FROM ( SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT(RWBH)) AS NUM, TO_CHAR (CJSJ, 'MM') AS CJSJ FROM T_GZRW_JBXX WHERE TO_CHAR( CJSJ, 'YYYY' ) = TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'YYYY' ) GROUP BY TO_CHAR (CJSJ, 'MM') ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT(RWBH)) AS NUM, TO_CHAR (CJSJ, 'MM') AS CJSJ FROM T_GZRW_JBXX WHERE BJQK = 1 AND TO_CHAR( CJSJ, 'YYYY' ) = TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'YYYY' ) GROUP BY TO_CHAR (CJSJ, 'MM') ) B ON A.CJSJ = B.CJSJ

SELECT T.NUM,T.YF,T.BJQK,Z.DMJMC FROM ( SELECT COUNT (1) NUM,TO_CHAR (CJSJ, 'MM') YF,YWLX,BJQK FROM T_GZRW_JBXX WHERE TO_CHAR (CJSJ, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'YYYY') GROUP BY TO_CHAR (CJSJ, 'MM'),YWLX,BJQK) T LEFT JOIN T_PLATFORM_GGDMJ Z ON T.YWLX = Z.DMJBH

INSERT INTO T_GZRW_JBXX (XH, YWLX, YWZLX, YWGLXH, RWBH, RWLY, RWMC, RWNR, SJKSSJ, SJJSSJ, RWCSYY, YQBJSJ, FZJG, BLR, CJSJ, CJR, TYPE) VALUES (#{XH}, #{YWLX}, #{YWZLX}, #{YWGLXH}, #{RWBH}, #{RWLY}, #{RWMC}, #{RWNR}, #{SJKSSJ}, #{SJJSSJ}, #{RWCSYY}, #{YQBJSJ}, #{FZJG}, #{BLR}, #{CJSJ}, #{CJR}, #{TYPE})
